exp1: At Ay Jalisco, I buss tables, present menus, seat customers and take orders. I trained 2 new bussers, ensuring attention to detail and comprehensive understanding of restaurant methodology and practices.
exp2: At Mulla Media, I worked alongside a team to help create marketing campaigns for Orlando musicians. My team generated 15,000+ streams across multiple music streaming platforms. We utilized many forms of media such as photography, video, graphic design, and audio to create mixed media assets for marketing campaigns.
